official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase from $300, to $600, and from $600 to $1,200, respectively, the valuation limitations relating to the duty-free importation of personal articles by returning United States residents.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the valuation limitations relating to the duty-free importation of personal articles by returning United States residents.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase from $300, to $600, and from $600 to $1,200, respectively, the valuation limitations relating to the duty-free importation of personal articles by returning United States residents.
